file_content.text: Can't say I'll be sad to leave Nar Shaddaa, Captain.
Viidu once told me, "Don't fall in love with Nar Shaddaa. It won't love you back." I'm starting to see his point.
And here I thought Coruscant was bad. Nar Shaddaa is a whole new level of not right.
Mind stepping back? A man can't get any breathing room in this blasted place.
